TikitButton.class: w-auto h-10 rounded-md bg-gray-500 ios:bg-selected-black/10 touch-feedback

Icon.class: w-9 h-10 ml-0 text-xl text-center touch-enabled-false text-white/90 fa fa-check-circle

Label.class: font-regular w-auto h-10 vertical-align-top ml-9 mr-2 text-xl text-left touch-enabled-false text-white/90
